text: Manfred Müller (15 November 1926 – 20 May 2015) was a German Catholic bishop. Born in Augsburg, Germany, Müller was ordained to the priesthood in 1952 and was appointed titular bishop of Iubaltiana and auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Augsburg in 1972. In 1982, he was appointed bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Regensburg and retired in 2002. On 20 May 2015, he died in the Mallersdorf Abbey in Bavaria. ==References== Category:Roman Catholic bishops of Regensburg Category:Roman Catholic bishops in Germany Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths
title: Manfred Müller (bishop)
